item.title: VolgaCTF 2017: Share Point - web 200
item.description: Author: @mjdubell Share Point Look! I wrote a good service for sharing your files with your friends, enjoy) share-point.quals.2017.volgactf.ru The challenge begun by signing in to the control panel by simply entering random account details. Once logged in you had the ability to upload files and share them with an other user. Since the site only had one functionality, uploading files, I assumed the goal had to be to upload a web shell and find the flag on the file system.
